name: A heavy shockburned full plate
data: It increases the users strength divinely.
It increases the users constitution impossibly much.
It decreases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It decreases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It decreases the users charisma a tiny bit.
It has superb armour class for its type (magnificent in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration phenomenally.
It increases the users electric resistance superbly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
